authdriver.name: authfront.otp
authdriver.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Authentication One-time-password]
authdriver.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Use Google Authenticator, Yubikey or standard password to authenticate users.]

global_param.name: ORDER
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Order]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Order this plugin with other auth frontends]

global_param.name: PROTOCOL_TYPE
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Protocol Type]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Enable/disable automatically based on the protocol used]

global_param.name: MODIFY_LOGIN_SCREEN
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Modify login page]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Login page will be modified to give user a OTP textbox.]

global_param.name: YUBICO_SECRET_KEY
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Yubico Secret Key]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Yubico secret key attached to your account]

global_param.name: YUBICO_CLIENT_ID
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Yubico Client ID]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Yubico client id attached to your account]

param.name: google_enabled_admin
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Force Google Authenticator]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Force Google Auth usage without letting the choice to the user.]

param.name: google_enabled
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Enable Google Authenticator]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[If you enable it for the first time, you will be able to configure Google Authenticator application next time you log in.]

param.name: google_last
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Google Authenticator Last]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Google Authenticator replay protection, do not edit]

processing.clientForm:
AJXP_MESSAGE[authfront.otp.2]
AJXP_MESSAGE[authfront.otp.3]
AJXP_MESSAGE[authfront.otp.4]
AJXP_MESSAGE[authfront.otp.5]

client_configs.template:
<script>
                  document.observe("ajaxplorer:afterApply-login", function(){
                    var f= modal.getForm();

                    var enableModifyGUI = ajaxplorer.getPluginConfigs("authfront.otp").get('MODIFY_LOGIN_SCREEN');

                    if(!enableModifyGUI) return;

                    if(f.down('input[name="otp_code"]')){
                        return;
                    }
                    try{
                        var el = f.down('input[name="password"]').up("div.SF_element");
                        var clone = el.cloneNode(true);
                        el.insert({after:clone});
                        var newField = clone.down('input[name="password"]');
                        newField.writeAttribute('name', 'otp_code');
                        newField.writeAttribute('data-ajxpLoginAdditionalParameter', 'true');
                        clone.down('div.SF_label').update('Unique Code (6 digits)');
                    }catch(e){
                        if(console) console.log('Error while replacing OTP field', e);
                    }
                  });
            </script>
